title: Healthcare Practice Competency Enhancement: Design Thinking and NLP-Based Elementary Reading/Writing & Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic reading and writing skills, and ability to use digital devices at a fundamental level
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students improve reading comprehension and writing expression skills by 30% or more through design thinking activities using scientific topics
Improve motivation and autonomous learning habit indicators by 25% by applying NLP-based language pattern training
Complete two or more projects using online collaboration tools to fulfill the 4-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Experiment)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
